Package maldiniPaone.servlets.managers

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.servlets.managers.UserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManageAccountModification, ManageAuthorityPosition, ManageLogin, ManageRegistration, ManageRegistrationByManager, ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities, ManageUserDataRetrieve
public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManageAccountModification, ManageAuthorityPosition, ManageLogin, ManageRegistration, ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities, ManageUserDataRetrieve, ManageRegistrationByManager
Implements ManageAccountModification , ManageAuthorityPosition , ManageLogin , ManageRegistration, ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities ,ManageRegistrationByManager and ManageUserDataRetrieve. Singleton design pattern

      cityHallProvince - : the province of the city hall of the creator

      bottomRightDistrictBound - : the coordinates of the bottom right bound of the district where the authority works
